page.title: 18Activities cont.
page.content:
25% of parents listed gardening as an important spare time activity, 14% listed home improvment or DIY. 10% listed reading, 5% listed attending parties, dances, going to the pub etc. 4% listed walking, 1% listed sewing, knitting and cooking,and 1% listed photography. The 9 to 11 year olds preffered such activities as listen- ing to pop music, dancing, riding on their bicycles and attending Guides or Brownies. About 10% of them spent time playing musical instruments such as the piano, guitar, flute and violin.
By Brandon Hill School
